actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for dual membership of one member each of the Commodities Futures Trading Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to add to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission a commissioner of the Securities and Exchange Commission as a voting ex officio member (to serve without additional compensation). Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to add to the Securities and Exchange Commission a commissioner of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission as a voting ex officio member (to serve without additional compensation).

titles.title: A bill to provide for dual membership of one member each of the Commodities Futures Trading Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission.
